search_results.snippet:
Encyclopedia Britannica ... Several basic roof designs. in roof. Two main types of 
roofs are flat roofs and sloping ones. The flat roof has historically been widely 
used in the Middle East, the American Southwest, and anywhere else where the 
climate is arid and the drainage of water off the roof is thus of secondary 
importance.
